dt-api.name: columns().deselect()

type.returns: API instance that contains a reference to the deselected columns.
type.description: Deselect one or more columns in the table, based on the columns found by the `dt-api columns()` method.

dt-api.description: This method simply deselects the columns that have been found by the `dt-api columns()` selector method.

example.title: Deselect all columns which have a class of 'important'
